algorithm: The new algorithm calculates a factor by averaging the 10-day moving averages of the open and close prices, then adjusts this average using the exponential moving average (EMA) of the 20-day cumulative trading volume to emphasize recent trading activity.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    df['avg_price'] = (df['open'].rolling(window=10).mean() + df['close'].rolling(window=10).mean()) / 2
    df['ema_cum_volume_20'] = df['volume'].rolling(window=20).sum().ewm(span=20, adjust=False).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (df['avg_price'] * df['ema_cum_volume_20']).dropna()
    return heuristics_matrix
